Supplier.description: Laboratory or supplier name issuing the water activity report (header/footer).

MaterialName.description: Material name tested for water activity.

MaterialCode.description: Material identifier or code, if present on the report.

Lot.description: Batch/lot identifier for the tested sample.

ReportDate.description: Report date or test date associated with the result.

WaterActivity.description: Water activity (aw) numeric value. Strip labels like 'aw' and capture the decimal number (e.g., 0.420).

TemperatureC.description: Temperature in Â°C at which aw was measured (e.g., 25). If stated as a range, prefer the target/nominal test temperature.

Instrument.description: Instrument/model used for aw measurement (e.g., Aqualab 4TE).
